Reviews.Title: “OK hotel, poor location”
Reviews.Author: HicketyJim
Reviews.Content: hotel fine average friendly helpful staff downside immediate location run explore vicinity turkish takeaways apart else public transport connections close main park 20 minute walk reichstag cant help feeling gotten price happening

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Tulip Park Consul Hotel
